post.body: Smart idea - re the bus. Good luck & all the best.
is it not interesting that Coke is probably the most maligned beverage co yet remains very popular & entrepreneurial?
Is this the same article that was on Twitip today? Guess so. I got a lot of Tweets about that.
Great Einstein quote; love things Einstein
That is an interesting Mark Twain quote
Tweeted the link you sent me; hope you get some traction and uptake. Good luck.
No prob will 'tweet-zhiing'. Do u have a url or short statement u want 'Tweeted?
hmm interesting idea.
Thanks & glad you enjoyed this one. Hope u enjoy the others I have posted & will post in future. Have a gt day.
Sort of; it means u should payattention to 'words'. The tongue - originator of words- is powerful. U shd also watch ur words
(2) so this makes the tongue very powerful; one needs to therefore pay attention to (the power behind) spoken words. Is this ok?
(1) 'Salt & pepper' are essentail to life; they represent life. The tongue is the only 'tool' that can taste salt or pepper
Like that phrase 'friends of the cause.' Wish you all the best; seemed like a cool product to me that is why I signed up!
Ha ha. Well u know the most difficult / hardest person to deceive is yourself. It is also the most easiest!
Will let u know how it works out. Great tool: hope it grows huge! How r u pushing marketing on Twitter?
I have bb maps and so that is covered. I like the 'zhiing' rings logo. It actually reflects or represents the name zhiing!
: did you really founde zhiing? I have it on my BB curve but have not used it yet! Interesting.
www.zhiing.com. This is a location based service which let's your friends find your location. It is a cool feature. Creator is @jonziskind
The more you stretch your comfort zone the wider it becomes, therefore you end up doing more, easily and effortlessly.
Ghanaian Proverb: 'If the tongue that eats salt and pepper talks about you; it will be prudent to listen.'
